==German== ===Etymology=== From Late {{inh|de|gmh|schranc}}, from {{inh|de|goh|scranc}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*skrankaz|t=grid, barrier}}. Cognate with {{cog|nds-de|Schrank|t=barrier, barricade}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ʃʀaŋk/}} * {{rhymes|de|aŋk}} * {{audio|de|De-Schrank.ogg|Audio}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|m|Schrankes|gen2=Schranks|Schränke|Schränkchen}} # [[cabinet]] {{gloss|storage closet either separate from, or built into, a wall}}, or {{q|specifically}}: ## [[cupboard]] {{gloss|cabinet, often built into a wall, with shelves intended for storage}} ## [[wardrobe]], [[closet]] {{gloss|cupboard or cabinet designed for storing clothes}} ## [[bookcase]] {{gloss|piece of furniture for the storage and display of books}} # [[locker]] {{gloss|storage compartment with a lock}} ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-m|(e)s|pl=Schränke}} ====Hyponyms==== {{der3|de |{{l|de|Chemikalienschrank||chemical cabinet}} |{{l|de|Eckschrank||corner cupboard}} |{{l|de|Einbauschrank||built-in cabinet, built-in cupboard}} |{{l|de|Eisschrank||icebox}} |{{l|de|Gefrierschrank}} |{{l|de|Geldschrank}} |{{l|de|Giftschrank}} |{{l|de|Kleiderschrank}} |{{l|de|Kühlschrank}} |{{l|de|Medizinschrank||medicine cabinet}} |{{l|de|Panzerschrank}} |{{l|de|Schlafzimmerschrank||bedroom closet}} |{{l|de|Waffenschrank||gun cabinet, weapons cabinet}} |{{l|de|Wandschrank||closet}} {{qual|built-in}} }} ====Related terms==== * {{l|de|Schranke}} [[Category:de:Furniture]] ---- ==Hunsrik== ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|hrx|/ʃraŋk/}} ===Noun=== {{head|hrx|noun|g=m|plural|Schrenk|diminutive|Schrenkche}} # [[cabinet]] ===Further reading=== * [https://hunsriqueanoriograndense.wordpress.com/dicionario-werterbuch/ Online Hunsrik Dictionary]
